THE NUDGE

This craft is one for those who like a challenge when flying a craft, like pushing to the limits, like the suspense of almost running out of fuel, if you like Large and Sluggish crafts that require patience and skillful Landings. If you like these conditions check out The Nudge, it's not pretty but very functional.

OPERATIONS

At the runway apply the brakes, Lower the Ladders Action Group 4 and the Landing Gear to allow the Engineer to board the Craft. Note: When flying with an Engineer if you plan to do an Engine Room Check now is the time to do it, I do not recommended to do Engine Room Checks during flight, also be sure to return the control to the Pilot. Now close the floor hatch using Action Group 9. Apply full throttle and activate the RCS & SAS during the Launch and remember to shut down the RCS because your Propellant is limited and will be useful when Landing. The MK1 Can will release with the space bars first press or when the Lift Engines are Engaged with Action Group 1.

Keep in mind this is not a quick mission, after your craft is on course to the Airbase on the Island as recommended for this Mission, you will have time to fix a cup of coffee, check the mail and take the dog for a walk before you get there. Have fun and thanks in advance for giving THE NUDGE a try.
